医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
TTUHSC 获得近 230 万美元的 CPRIT 赠款以支持癌症研究德克萨斯州癌症预防和研究所 (CPRIT) 最近向德克萨斯理工大学健康科学中心 (TTUHSC) 的四名研究人员提供了资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/TTUHSC-receives-nearly-2423-million-in-CPRIT-grants-to-support-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/TTUHSC-receives-nearly-2423-million-in-CPRIT-grants-to-support-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ff88994-f753-4a3b-a0b7-200b6f78f688 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 13:14:38 -0400 TTUHSC receives nearly $2.3 million in CPRIT grants to support cancer research
研究重点介绍了识别 2 型糖尿病高危儿童的方法和预防策略《内分泌学会杂志》的一项新研究强调了如何识别罹患 2 型糖尿病的高风险儿童以及预防策略，例如抗肥胖或抗糖尿病药物以及生活方式的改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-highlights-ways-to-identify-children-at-high-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-and-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Study-highlights-ways-to-identify-children-at-high-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-and-prevention-strategies.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68df5350-9c31-4b08-8205-5975c4b8a59a Thu, 12 Oct 2023 12:59:04 -0400 Study highlights ways to identify children at high risk of type 2 diabetes and prevention strategies
癌症患者和肿瘤学家支持补充疗法，但存在沟通差距根据代表 Healing Works Foundation 进行的一项新调查，患者和肿瘤学家支持癌症治疗的补充疗法，例如营养咨询、运动、按摩和调解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Cancer-病人-and-oncologies-support-complementary-therapies-but-communication-gap-exists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Cancer-病人-and-oncologies-support-complementary-therapies-but-communication-gap-exists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b5c9cc4-7737-4ae4-8daa-8c80d7de08fb Thu, 12 Oct 2023 12:41:10 -0400 Cancer patients and oncologists support complementary therapies, but communication gap exists

“我太累了”：努力去看专家加剧了河滨县妇女的痛苦特蕾莎·约翰逊无法摆脱痛苦。她的全身就像是一下子被针扎了一样。晚上，她有时会从睡梦中惊醒，以为臭虫正在攻击她。但这只是日复一日的持续不断的痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/e28098Ie28099m-so-burned-oute28099-Fighting-to-see-a-specialist-amplified-pain-for-Riverside-County-woman.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/e28098Ie28099m-so-burned-oute28099-Fighting-to-see-a-specialist-amplified-pain-for-Riverside-County-woman.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f57c9d8-aea2-45fa-965f-906a9aec1206 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 06:49:03 -0400 ‘I’m so burned out’: Fighting to see a specialist amplified pain for Riverside County woman
